desc: Students work intensively on a special topic in applied mathematics. Topics vary from year to year. May be repeated if topic is different. Offered periodically.
name: Sem: Algorithms for Decision Making
notes: Open only to rising Juniors and Seniors.

title: Topics in Applied Mathematics
